analyzed: gadāparva
nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam

original: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayamudīrayet // Bhmj_10.1 //
analyzed: devīm sarasvatīm vyāsam tatas jayam udīrayet
tatas drauṇi mukhāḥ vīrāḥ samabhyetya rathāḥ trayaḥ
hradam praviṣṭam rājānam ūcuḥ māna dhanam śaraiḥ
rājan uttiṣṭha saṃgrāme jahi śatrum dhanurdhara
saha asmābhiḥ ayam kālaḥ vikramasya yaśaḥ bhuvaḥ
iti śrutvā kuru patiḥ praśaṃsan tad parākramam

original: ūce prātaḥ samāśvāsya mama kṣatrocitā gatiḥ // Bhmj_10.4 //
analyzed: ūce prātar samāśvāsya mama kṣatra ucitā gatiḥ

original: iti teṣāṃ samālāpaṃ śrutvā jñātvā suyodhanam /
analyzed: iti teṣām samālāpam śrutvā jñātvā suyodhanam
śaśaṃsuḥ bhīmasenāya lubdhakāḥ dhana lubdhakāḥ
bhīmasena girā rājā sa sainyaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
kṛṣṇa pradhānaiḥ sahitaḥ tam deśam tūrṇam āyayau
garjat gaja ratha anīkaiḥ pārthān vīkṣya samāgatān
narendra sūcana bhayāt prayayuḥ gautama ādayaḥ
tasya kṛṣṇasya vacasā dharmasūnuḥ suyodhanam

original: tataḥ sa salilāntaḥsthamuvāca kṣmābhṛtāṃ varaḥ // Bhmj_10.8 //
analyzed: tatas sa salila antaḥstham uvāca kṣmābhṛtām varaḥ
rājan rajata karpūra rajanīpati sundaram

original: aho vīra yaśaḥ śubhraṃ bhavatā malinīkṛtam // Bhmj_10.9 //
analyzed: aho vīra yaśaḥ śubhram bhavatā malinīkṛtam
ghātayitvā narapatīn lakṣmī kula gṛhān raṇe

original: prāṇarakṣāparo mānī kathaṃ jīvanna lajjase // Bhmj_10.10 //
analyzed: prāṇa rakṣā paraḥ mānī katham jīvan na lajjase

original: uttiṣṭha yuddhe svāṃ lakṣmīṃ tridivaṃ vā samāpnuhi /
analyzed: uttiṣṭha yuddhe svām lakṣmīm tridivam vā samāpnuhi

original: lākṣaḥ samo hi vīrāṇāṃ vijayo nidhanaṃ nu vā // Bhmj_10.11 //
analyzed: lākṣaḥ samaḥ hi vīrāṇām vijayaḥ nidhanam nu vā
iti yaudhiṣṭhiram śrutvā vacaḥ manyu viṣa ākulaḥ

original: prāha dūryodhanastoye stambheram iva śvasan // Bhmj_10.12 //
analyzed: prāha dūryodhanaḥ toye stambheram iva śvasan
evam etat yathā āttha tvam śriyam nidhanam eva me

original: bandhusvajanahīnā tu lakṣmīḥ kasya manaḥ spṛśet // Bhmj_10.13 //
analyzed: bandhu sva jana hīnā tu lakṣmīḥ kasya manaḥ spṛśet
dhvajinī vīra hīnena goṣṭhī iva budha varjitā

original: svajanena vinā lakṣmīḥ kasya prīṇāti mānasam // Bhmj_10.14 //
analyzed: sva janena vinā lakṣmīḥ kasya prīṇāti mānasam

original: sa karṇaḥ suhṛdāmagryaḥ sa guruḥ sa pitāmahaḥ /
analyzed: sa karṇaḥ suhṛdām agryaḥ sa guruḥ sa pitāmahaḥ

original: vinā tapovanamaho sumuneḥ kasya vismaret // Bhmj_10.15 //
analyzed: vinā tapaḥ vanam aho su muneḥ kasya vismaret
bandhu mittra viyuktānām bhūtayaḥ hi viḍambanāḥ
andhānām iva saundarya vicitrāḥ citra mālikāḥ
bhuṅkṣva bhuktām mayā pṛthvīm vīra ratna vivarjitām
vairāgya muktā ābharaṇām jaratīm iva yoṣitam
iti ākarṇya pṛthāsūnuḥ dhārtarāṣṭram abhāṣata
diṣṭyā tapaḥ vana ruciḥ śāntaḥ si vasudhā pate

original: sūcyagramapi na tyājyaṃ pāṇḍavānprati te bhuvaḥ /
analyzed: sūcyagram api na tyājyam pāṇḍavān prati te bhuvaḥ
samagrām pṛthivīm adya dātum icchasi kautukam

original: uttiṣṭha yuddhamekena tavāstu vijitaḥ sa cet /
analyzed: uttiṣṭha yuddham ekena tava astu vijitaḥ sa ced

original: jitāḥ sarve tvayā rājanmā pralāpaiḥ kṛśo bhava // Bhmj_10.20 //
analyzed: jitāḥ sarve tvayā rājan mā pralāpaiḥ kṛśaḥ bhava
udatiṣṭhat niśamya etat pārtha vākyam nṛpaḥ krudhā

original: sāvalepaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā na sahante hi māninaḥ // Bhmj_10.21 //
analyzed: sa avalepam vacaḥ śrutvā na sahante hi māninaḥ
hema aṅgada gadā pāṇiḥ sumeruḥ iva śṛṅgavān

original: utthitaḥ sa babhau rājā daṇḍadhāra ivāparaḥ // Bhmj_10.22 //
analyzed: utthitaḥ sa babhau rājā daṇḍadhāraḥ iva aparaḥ
kṛṣṇa vākyāt sa saṃnaddhaḥ gadā pāṇiḥ vṛkodaraḥ
tasya tasthau puras kṛṣṇā nikāra gaṇanā paraḥ
duryodhana āvirbhāvaḥ
atrā antare haladharaḥ kuru pāṇḍava saṃkṣaye
bandhu nāśa bhaya udvignaḥ tīrtha yātrā gataḥ śanais
tadā abhyetya kurukṣetram tau apaśyat gadā āyudhau

original: śiṣyayoḥ samaraṃ paśyañśṛṇvanniva giro mithaḥ // Bhmj_10.25 //
analyzed: śiṣyayoḥ samaram paśyan śṛṇvan iva giraḥ mithas
sa pūjitaḥ kṛṣṇa mukhyaiḥ pārthaiḥ śaśi śata dyutiḥ
upāviśat nīla vāsāḥ himavān iva sa ambudaḥ
iti ākarṇya kathā padhye papraccha janamejayaḥ
tīrtha yātrām halabhṛtaḥ vaiśampāyanam ādarāt
saḥ bravīt prastute yuddhe kuru pāṇḍava bhūbhujām

original: āmantrya kṛṣṇaṃ prayayau kṣayāśaṅkī pralambahā // Bhmj_10.28 //
analyzed: āmantrya kṛṣṇam prayayau kṣaya āśaṅkī pralamba hā
puṣpeṇa nirgataḥ rāmaḥ dvijebhyaḥ sarva kāma daḥ
sarasvatīm avāpya atha prabhāsam śayanena saḥ
yatra tārāpatim tārā rohiṇī sakta mānasam
khinnā nyavedayat pitre tad śāpāt saḥ bhavat kṣayī
kṣaṇena śāpāt prakṣīṇe śaśalakṣmaṇi yakṣmaṇā
sarva kṣaya bhaya udvignaiḥ daivaiḥ diṣṭam tadā yayau
tat prabhāsam hasan tūrṇam tatra api prāpa pūrṇa tām

original: tatra bharādvajaḥ snātvā tritakūpaṃ samāyayau // Bhmj_10.32 //
analyzed: tatra bharādvajaḥ snātvā tritakūpam samāyayau
upekṣitaḥ purā yatra bhrātṛbhyām nṛpatiḥ tritaḥ

original: sa cakre mānasaṃ yajñaṃ tato devāḥ samabhyayuḥ // Bhmj_10.33 //
analyzed: sa cakre mānasam yajñam tatas devāḥ samabhyayuḥ
tatas varāt sa kūpaḥ bhūt soma pāna phala pradaḥ
tasmin sarasvatī tīre sasne rāmeṇa sādaram

original: tato vinaśanaṃ puṇyaṃ prāpa yatra sarasvatī /
analyzed: tatas vinaśanam puṇyam prāpa yatra sarasvatī
śūdra bhīruka vidviṣṭā vinaṣṭā duṣṭa nāśinī
sa bhūmikam tatas prāyāt balī yatra apsaraḥ sakhā
krīḍanti sura gandharvāḥ nṛtya gīta vinodanaiḥ
durgasrotaḥ śaṅkhatīrtham puṇyam dvaitavanam tathā
avāpya nagadhanvānam vasatiḥ yatra vāsukeḥ

original: viveśa naimiṣa rāmo yatra prācī sarasvatī /
analyzed: viveśa naimiṣa rāmaḥ yatra prācī sarasvatī
munīnām darśanam yatra naimiṣa araṇya vāsinām
sapta sārasvatam prāyāt yatra caṅkaṇakaḥ muniḥ
nanarta gātrāt ālokya nijāt śāka rasam srutam
nṛtyataḥ tasya sa āvegam sa khelam vara kānanam
muneḥ tapaḥ prabhāvena jagat sarvam nanarta ca
devaiḥ atha arthitaḥ bhyetya tasya śambara darśanāt
sva karāt niḥsṛtam bhasma tena abhūt nirmadaḥ muniḥ
tasmai stuti kṛte tuṣṭaḥ tapaḥ vṛddhim dadau vibhuḥ

original: saptasārasvate tīrthe saṃnidhānaṃ ca śaṃkaraḥ // Bhmj_10.42 //
analyzed: saptasārasvate tīrthe saṃnidhānam ca śaṃkaraḥ
kapālamocanam prāpa tīrtham auśanasam balaḥ
yatra jaṅghā grahāt muktaḥ muniḥ ghorāt mahodaraḥ
rāghava iṣu nikṛttasya rākṣasasya śiraḥ purā

original: mahodarasya jaṅghāyāṃ lagnaṃ kila visarpadam // Bhmj_10.44 //
analyzed: mahodarasya jaṅghāyām lagnam kila visarpa dam
sarva tīrtha nimagnaḥ pi tatra eva svāsthyam āpa saḥ
uttaṅka āśramam āsādya pṛthūdakam avāpa ca
vasiṣṭhena jitaḥ pūrvam dhenu hṛt brahma tejasā

original: rājanyavaṃśyo yatrāpa brahmatāṃ kauśiko muniḥ // Bhmj_10.46 //
analyzed: rājanya vaṃśyaḥ yatra āpa brahma tām kauśikaḥ muniḥ

original: tatra rāmo dadau bhūri dhanaṃ vārṣṇeyanandanaḥ /
analyzed: tatra rāmaḥ dadau bhūri dhanam vārṣṇeya nandanaḥ

original: tataḥ sārasvate kuñje yatrendro namucervadhāt // Bhmj_10.47 //
analyzed: tatas sārasvate kuñje yatra indraḥ namuceḥ vadhāt
brahmahatyā ākulaḥ muktaḥ tam prāpa dāruṇam śanais
somatīrtham tatas prāpa yatra iṣṭam amṛta tviṣā
tāraka khyaḥ hataḥ yatra ṣaṇmukhena mahā asuraḥ
skanda abhiṣekāt snātvā atha vahnitīrtham samāyayau
yatra analaḥ bhṛgoḥ śāpāt naṣṭaḥ bhūt nirvṛtaḥ punar
kauberam indratīrtham ca yāmunam ca acyutāgrajaḥ
devalasya āśramam prāpya jaijīṣavyaḥ su yoga vid

original: yatra sarvagataṃ brahma devalāya jagau muniḥ // Bhmj_10.51 //
analyzed: yatra sarva gatam brahma devalāya jagau muniḥ
tatas sārasvatam tīrtham āsasāda halāyudhaḥ
apasaraḥ darśanāt pūrvam śukram nipatitam jale
dadhīcasya muneḥ tena putram lebhe sarasvatī
dadhīcasya asthi nicaye mahā indrāyudha tām gate
anāvṛṣṭyām sa tanayaḥ tayā matsya aśanaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: sārasvataḥ suto vedānsa sasmāra mahāmatiḥ // Bhmj_10.54 //
analyzed: sārasvataḥ sutaḥ vedān sa sasmāra mahāmatiḥ
durbhikṣa karṣitāḥ nāma vismṛte dhyayane tatas
sarveṣām muni mukhyānām babhūva guruḥ arthitaḥ

original: tasmiṃstīrthe balaḥ snātvā yayau yatra purā vapuḥ /
analyzed: tasmin tīrthe balaḥ snātvā yayau yatra purā vapuḥ
sanatkumārī tapasā svargāya tyaktum udyatā

original: nāradaḥ prāha nodvāhaṃ vinā svargo bhavediti /
analyzed: nāradaḥ prāha na udvāham vinā svargaḥ bhavet iti

original: sā gālavasutāyaiva dinabhogyāṃ tanuṃ dadau // Bhmj_10.57 //
analyzed: sā gālava sutāya eva dina bhogyām tanum dadau

original: kṛtvā lalitamākāraṃ tridivaṃ ca yayau tataḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā lalitam ākāram tridivam ca yayau tatas

original: tatra snātvā ca datvā ca plakṣaprasravaṇe tathā // Bhmj_10.58 //
analyzed: tatra snātvā ca da tvā ca plakṣaprasravaṇe tathā
avāpa kāra pavanam tīrthāni ālokayan śanais
nāradāt tatra śuśrāva kurukṣetre nṛpa kṣayam
rāmatīrtha yātrā
pṛṣṭaḥ tha dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa saṃjayaḥ yuddham abravīt

original: bhīmasenasya virathaṃ kauravasya ca māninaḥ // Bhmj_10.60 //
analyzed: bhīmasenasya viratham kauravasya ca māninaḥ
samantapañcakam gatvā padbhyām eva suyodhanaḥ
tasthau akampaḥ mahatām adhikam dhairyam āpadi
tatas duryodhanaḥ vādīt dharmaputram saha anugāḥ
upaviśya nirīkṣantām bhavantaḥ yudhyamānayoḥ
ajātaśatruḥ śrutvā etat saha pāñcāla sainikaiḥ
upāviśat kṛṣṇasakhaḥ parivārya halāyudham
atha bhīmam gadā pāṇim baddha kakṣaḥ tarasvinam
ājuhāva vacaḥ yuddhe pravṛtte kuru nandanaḥ
tatas tayoḥ gadā ghāta jātā vahni kaṇā āvalī
vidadhe saṃbhrama āvṛtta hema ābharaṇa vibhramam
suraiḥ āpūrite vyomni yuddha darśana lālasaiḥ
babhūva nāka kāntānām kaḥ pi kautuka vibhramaḥ
ākṣepe varjane mokṣe rāja vṛttau nivartake
dhāvane samavasthāne viplute samaviplute
tau pragalbha tayā vīrau citra maṇḍala cāriṇau
sa nirghoṣam mahā vegaḥ pārśva deśam atāḍayat
tatas bhīmaḥ samādhūya gadām aśani niḥsvanām
bhrāmayāmāsa yena abhūt horaḥ gharagharāravaḥ
tatas tām prahiṇot bhīmaḥ giri gurvīm gadām javāt
a kampitaḥ tāḍitaḥ pi punar bhīmaḥ sṛjat gadām
punar moghīkṛtā rājñā sā apatat kampita avaniḥ
atha vakṣaḥ taṭe bhīmaḥ kauraveṇa samāhataḥ
na viveda kṣaṇam kiṃcid mūrchā vyākulita āśayaḥ
pāñcāla sṛñjaya anīke saṃdeha ākulite tatas
śanais bhīmaḥ samāśvasya pārśve nṛpam atāḍayat
gāḍha prahāra abhihataḥ patitaḥ kaurava īśvaraḥ
utthāya tūrṇam āhatya bhuvi bhīmam apātayat
athā apatat sura utsṛṣṭa puṣpa vṛṣṭiḥ yaśaḥ sitā
sādhuvāda āvalī sūnave kuru bhūpateḥ
atha utthite bhīmasene parimṛjya āśu śoṇitam
kaḥ nayoḥ adhikaḥ yoddhā papraccha iti arjunaḥ harim
saḥ bravīt balavān bhīmaḥ bhīma vīryaḥ kim ucyate
upadeśe gadā yuddhe kiṃtu yuddha parākrame
sa prayatnaḥ kuru patiḥ bhīmasenāt vilokyate

original: tasmānna dharmayuddhena bhīmaḥ śakto nipātane // Bhmj_10.77 //
analyzed: tasmāt na dharma yuddhena bhīmaḥ śaktaḥ nipātane

original: māyayā nihatā daityā māyāvadhyā hi māyinaḥ /
analyzed: māyayā nihatāḥ daityāḥ māyā vadhyāḥ hi māyinaḥ
ūru bhaṅgam atas bhīmaḥ vidadhātu asya māyayā
anyathā durjayaḥ rājā trayodaśa samā vyadhāt
eṣa loka bhayam bhīma ume
vidhāya gadayā śramam
vyāyāma caturaḥ vegāt ūrdhva cārī suyodhanaḥ
mahā śaileya bhaṅgo smin su karaḥ chidra darśanāt
ukte janārdanena iti bhīmaḥ cikṣepa bhīṣaṇām

original: gadāṃ tāṃ kururājo 'pi vilaṅghya tamatāḍayat // Bhmj_10.81 //
analyzed: gadām tām vilaṅghya tam atāḍayat
vyathām saṃstambhya ghūrṇamāna tanuḥ kṣaṇam
gadām randhram vicintya asmai prāhiṇot kanaka aṅgadām
puṣpāyudha pura udāra hema ābharaṇa vibhrame

original: ūruyugme bhujaṅgīva sā papāta mahīpateḥ // Bhmj_10.83 //
analyzed: ūru yugme bhujaṅgī iva sā papāta mahīpateḥ
nirghāta ghora ghana ghoṣa gadā nipāta niṣpeṣa jarjara tara truṭita ūru saṃdhiḥ

original: duryodhano 'tha nipapāta divaṃ vilokya vajrāvapātahatapakṣa ivādrirājaḥ // Bhmj_10.84 //
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ tha nipapāta divam vilokya vajra avapāta hata pakṣaḥ iva adrirājaḥ
akṣauhiṇī pati nareśvara mauli ratna raśmi chaṭā paṭala pāṭala pāda pīṭhe

original: asminmahīparivṛḍhe patite ca bhūmau kairninditaṃ na bhavabhaṅgurabhaṅgi janma // Bhmj_10.85 //
analyzed: asmin mahī parivṛḍhe patite ca bhūmau kaiḥ ninditam na bhava bhaṅgura bhaṅgi janma
tasmin ekādaśa camū nāthe bhuvi nipātite
cakampe lola taṭinī raśanā vasudhā vadhūḥ
babhūva bhaya daiḥ vyāptam durnimitta śataiḥ jagat
praśaṃsantaḥ ca tat yuddham prayayuḥ vyoma cāriṇaḥ
bhīmaḥ nikāra gaṇanām kurvan kuru pateḥ śiraḥ
caraṇena aspṛśat lakṣmī vilāsa sadanam tatas
tam vilokya ruroda iva patitam cakravartinam
tu aṅgat gadā aṅgada chinna hāra mukta aśrubhiḥ mahī
bhīmam nirasya garjantam dharmarājaḥ suyodhanam
ūce rājan tava eva ayam anayāt suhṛdām kṣayaḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā śiraḥ padā spṛṣṭaṃ bhīmena jagatībhujaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā śiraḥ padā spṛṣṭam bhīmena jagatībhujaḥ
prāha uttāla halaḥ kopa karālaḥ tāla lāñchanaḥ
pratāpa tāpita ricoḥ yaśaḥ śatru hṛta śriyaḥ

original: śiro vyājahatasyāsya kaḥ spṛśedapaśuḥ padā // Bhmj_10.92 //
analyzed: śiraḥ vyāja hatasya asya kaḥ spṛśet apaśuḥ padā
iti uktvā krodha śikhinā tam bhīmam dagdhum udyatam
śamayāmāsa kaṃsāriḥ taiḥ taiḥ vinaya bhāṣitaiḥ
viṣa dyuta agni doṣāṇām vādinam
kṛṣṇam duryodhanaḥ vādīt saṃstambhya rujam utkaṭām
gopāla bāla mūrkhāṇām saṃjñām kṛtvā asmi vañcitaḥ

original: tvayā bhīṣmamukhā vīrāste vyājaireva pātitāḥ // Bhmj_10.95 //
analyzed: tvayā bhīṣma mukhāḥ vīrāḥ te vyājaiḥ eva pātitāḥ
bhuktam suhṛdbhiḥ vihṛtam kāntābhiḥ hutam agrya jaiḥ

original: vadhaḥ kṣatrocitaḥ prāptaḥ ko 'nyo 'sti sadṛśo mayā // Bhmj_10.96 //
analyzed: vadhaḥ kṣatra ucitaḥ prāptaḥ kaḥ sti sadṛśaḥ mayā

original: bhrūbhaṅgena nivāsitā vanabhuvaṃ śuṣyanmukhāḥ śatravo dṛṣṭā śrīḥ svayamarpitāgryasuhṛdāmuṣṇīṣahārasmitā /
analyzed: bhrū bhaṅgena nivāsitāḥ vana bhuvam śuṣyat mukhāḥ śatravaḥ dṛṣṭā śrīḥ svayam arpitā agrya suhṛdām uṣṇīṣa hāra smitā

original: saṃgrāme 'pyaparāṅmukhasya nidhanaṃ dikṣu prarūḍhaṃ yaśaḥ kartavya spṛhaṇīyamanyadicitaṃ yuktaṃ kimastyāyuṣaḥ // Bhmj_10.97 //
analyzed: saṃgrāme pi a parāṅmukhasya nidhanam dikṣu prarūḍham yaśaḥ spṛhaṇīyam anyat icitam yuktam kim asti āyuṣaḥ
iti ākarṇya vacaḥ tasya lajjitāḥ iva māninaḥ

original: nṛpaiḥ saha yayuḥ pārthā nādayanto rathairjayam // Bhmj_10.98 //
analyzed: nṛpaiḥ saha yayuḥ pārthāḥ nādayantaḥ rathaiḥ jayam
athā avaropya prathamam phalguṇam madhusūdanaḥ
rathāt avātarat pascāt jajvāla sa rathaḥ tatas
droṇa karṇa astra dagdhaḥ yam atyantam jvalitaḥ rathaḥ
iti pṛṣṭaḥ vadat pārtham vismitam kāliyāntakaḥ
śrutvā iti saṃjayāt rājā dāruṇam moha vihvalaḥ
śuśoca putrān vākyāni vidurasya smaran muhur
tatas kṛṣṇa munau prāpte kuru veśma hariḥ nṛpam
gāndhārīm ca avadat prāpya visṛṣṭaḥ jātaśatruṇā
piśamam na aicchat kauravaḥ nija durnayāt

original: na ca dharmāccyutāḥ pārthāstena tena padaṃ ruṣaḥ // Bhmj_10.103 //
analyzed: na ca dharmāt cyutāḥ pārthāḥ tena tena padam ruṣaḥ
putrāḥ te yuvayoḥ adya pāṇḍu putrāḥ sura tviṣaḥ

original: yuvābhyāmeva coktaṃ prāgyato dharmastato jayaḥ // Bhmj_10.104 //
analyzed: yuvābhyām eva ca uktam prāk yatas dharmaḥ tatas jayaḥ
iti prasādya tau yāte vṛṣṇi vīre mbikāsutaḥ

original: munāvāśvāsya yāte ca śeṣaṃ papraccha saṃjayam // Bhmj_10.105 //
analyzed: munau āśvāsya yāte ca śeṣam papraccha saṃjayam
saḥ bravīt atha putraḥ te veṣyapa
mānaḥ mahī tale

original: māmūce paśya sūdena māyayāhaṃ nipātitaḥ // Bhmj_10.106 //
analyzed: mām ūce paśya sūdena māyayā aham nipātitaḥ
atrā antare samabhyetya drauṇi hārdikya gautamāḥ

original: dadṛśuḥ kauravapatiṃ nītaṃ kālena tāṃ daśām // Bhmj_10.107 //
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ kaurava patim nītam kālena tām daśām
tatas guru sutaḥ kopāt viniṣpiṣya kare karam
niḥśeṣa śatru nidhane pratijñām niḥśvasan vyadhāt

original: atha vīraṃ tamāliṅgya cakre senāpatiṃ nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: atha vīram tam āliṅgya cakre senāpatim nṛpaḥ
na hi ahaṃkāra śaithilyam paryante pi abhimāninām
pralaya ambuda nirghoṣam vinadya droṇa nandanaḥ

original: niśāyāṃ tāṃ rujā rājā viṣamāmagamaddaśām // Bhmj_10.110 //
analyzed: niśāyām tām rujā rājā viṣamām agamat daśām
tatas gautama hārdikya guru putrāḥ mahā vanam
viviśuḥ kalayantaḥ ntar śriyaḥ kallola lola tām
iti kṣemendra viracitāyām bhāratamañjaryām gadāparva
